description: Executable skills that agents can invoke as named functions.

capabilities.description: Analyze datasets, compute statistics, detect patterns

capabilities.description: Design UI layouts, components, style systems

capabilities.name: debugging
capabilities.description: Analyze errors, suggest and apply fixes

capabilities.name: social-media
capabilities.description: Create and schedule social media content

capabilities.name: contract-review
capabilities.description: Review contracts for risks and issues
